name: testdouble
description: A minimal test double library for TDD with JavaScript

scripts.clean: rm -rf generated dist lib .coverage && yarn run clean:dist
scripts.compile:node: yarn run compile:node:coffee && yarn run compile:node:babel
scripts.compile:test: yarn run compile:test:coffee && yarn run compile:test:babel
scripts.compile: yarn run compile:node && yarn run compile:test && yarn run compile:browser
scripts.test:cover:run: EXTRA_MOCHA_ARGS="--reporter mocha-istanbul" COVER=.coverage/lib ISTANBUL_REPORT_DIR=.coverage ISTANBUL_REPORTERS=lcov,html yarn run test
scripts.test:cover: yarn run compile:node && yarn run test:cover:instrument && yarn run test:cover:run
scripts.test:example:webpack: cd examples/webpack && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:node: cd examples/node && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:lineman: cd examples/lineman && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:babel: cd examples/babel && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example: yarn run test:example:node && yarn run test:example:lineman && yarn run test:example:webpack && yarn run test:example:babel
scripts.test:all: yarn test && testem ci && yarn run test:example && yarn run test:typescript
scripts.test:ci: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && yarn run test:all && yarn run clean:dist && echo "All done!"
scripts.version:changelog: if command -v github_changelog_generator &>/dev/null; then github_changelog_generator; git commit -m "Changelog for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md; else echo Versioning requires you first run 'gem install github_changelog_generator' >&2; fi
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn run version:changelog && git push && npm publish --tag=next
scripts.version: yarn run version:write && yarn run compile && git add dist src/version.coffee
